message.body: I'm terrible, but I was at haverford today (in my defense, I told no one), but just wanted to say I love you and I hope thesis isn't killing you!

Awww :/ what were you here for? Thesis is currently nonexistent haha...meaning advisers are currently reading drafts. So I'm not thinking about it :) how are you? How's life and work and Philly living?

There was an alumni event (it was mostly people in there sixties haha), but I drove down with emily and she needed to get back to grad apps. Life is busy but I'm pretty happy about everything. How are you?! If you ever get tired of haverford, feel free to come visit :)
Ooh I should! Haha I know I keep saying that >.< the chocolate tasting thing? I saw Rachel in the dc lobby :) how was it?
Also besides the onslaught of end-of-semester things, I'm good! :)
Yes, that! Pretty good. Lots of chocolate haha. I know, it's hard to leave, but it's a pretty fun place out here :) glad to hear things are going well!
